title: 📝 Daily Summary — February 17, 2026
content:
# **Tuesday, February 17th, 2026**

## What We Built

### Mission Control Dashboard
- **Global starfield background** — Space-themed particles across all pages (ported from Stratify)
- **Persistent Fred chat bar** — AI assistant available from any tab
- **Color-coded status indicators** — RUNNING (red), COMPLETED (green), QUEUED (blue), FAILED (red) with pulsing dots
- **Color-coded borders** — Deployment cards and event rows show activity state visually
- **Chat UX improvements** — Fixed layout: input below responses, fixed-height message panel, eliminated page shaking

### Stratify Trading Platform
- **Professional landing page** — New white paper content at `/whitepaper` route
- **Auth + payment lock** — Dashboard gated behind Supabase auth + Stripe verification
- **War Room as default** — Replaced Home tab with War Room as first tab
- **Clear Save Intel action** — Added bottom action button on War Room cards

### Second Brain Knowledge Base
- **Renamed Market Intel → Cron Jobs** — Panel now shows ALL cron outputs (x-engagement, market-intel, daily-summary, trade-log)
- **Fixed right-side panel** — Previously empty, now displays full cron jobs feed (MarketIntelFeed.tsx in ChatPanel)
- **Critical Rules system** — Created `critical-rules` folder for storing development rules, saves to both local file AND website

### Mobile Second Brain App
- **React Native (Expo)** — Built at `~/Desktop/Mobile_2nd_BRAIN/`
- **4 tabs:** Documents, Chat, Cron Jobs, Markets
- **API integration** — Connects to second-brain-beige-gamma.vercel.app
- **Status:** Needs Expo Go on iPhone for testing (not a web URL)

## What We Fixed

### Cron Job Delivery ($120/day → $15-20/day savings!)
- **Fixed 4 cron jobs** — X Engagement, Market Intel, TradeBot, Daily Summary had delivery issues
- **Timeout adjustments** — Bumped Market Intel & X Engagement from 600s → 1200s
- **Delivery configuration** — Added `to` field with Jeff's Telegram ID (8222086857), not just `channel`
- **Cost optimization (MAJOR):**
  - Created new `cron` agent (CronRunner) on Sonnet 4.5
  - Moved Market Intel, Sophia Morning, Sophia Insights, Daily Summary from main (Opus) → cron (Sonnet)
  - Reduced X Engagement frequency: 24x/day → 4x/day (8am, 12pm, 4pm, 8pm)
  - Reduced Market Intel: every 2hrs → every 4hrs
  - **Result:** ~$120/day → ~$15-20/day (85% cost reduction)

### Mac Sleep Fix
- **Caffeinate setup** — Ran `caffeinate -s` to keep Mac awake for Telegram connectivity
- **Launch agent** — Created `~/Library/LaunchAgents/com.stratify.caffeinate.plist` for auto-start on boot

### Mission Control
- **API keys reveal broken** — ENCRYPTION_SECRET env var mismatch on Vercel (identified, not yet fixed)

## Key Decisions

### Architecture
- **Cron agent separation** — All scheduled tasks run on dedicated Sonnet 4.5 agent, not main Opus session
- **Delivery to field** — Cron jobs targeting Telegram need explicit `to` user ID, not just channel name
- **Critical rules dual-save** — All future "save to critical rules" go to BOTH local file AND Second Brain website

### Design Direction
- **Premium, alive, animated, modern, dark** — Starfield backgrounds, pulsing status dots, color-coded borders
- **War Room first** — Changed default tab order to prioritize active trading/intel workflows

### Frequency Optimization
- **X Engagement:** 4x/day only (peak hours)
- **Market Intel:** Every 4 hours instead of 2
- **Trade balance:** Cost vs. coverage for cron-based automation

## Important Info

### Project Locations
- **Stratify:** `~/Desktop/stratify/` — stratify-eight.vercel.app
- **Second Brain:** `~/Desktop/second-brain/` — second-brain-beige-gamma.vercel.app

- **Mobile 2nd Brain:** `~/Desktop/Mobile_2nd_BRAIN/` (React Native/Expo)

### Agent Assignments
- **main (Opus):** Direct Jeff chats, high-value strategic work
- **cron (Sonnet 4.5):** Market Intel, Daily Summary, Sophia Morning/Insights
- **xbot (Sonnet):** X Engagement posts/replies/likes
- **trader (Sonnet):** TradeBot automated trading logs

### Cron Schedule
- **X Engagement:** 8am, 12pm, 4pm, 8pm (4x/day)
- **Market Intel:** Every 4 hours
- **Daily Summary:** 11pm daily
- **Stratify Status:** Every 4hrs (suppressed as NO_REPLY)
